name: EUROPEAN CHEMICAL REGIONS NETWORK
goal: The European Chemical Regions Network is an international non-profit association that promotes the European chemical regions. The association pursues the following aims: (1) Advocating common interests towards the institutions of the European Union, (2) Exchanging and transfer of knowledge, (3) Disseminating information and contacts between the chemical regions in Europe, (4) Initiating of projects for the promotion of the chemical regions, (5) Being open to all chemical regions in Europe, (6) 	Developing new relationships with business partners, trade unions and other associations and organisations relevant for the chemical regions in Europe.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
